item.title: GrabAGun 股价暴跌，原因是小特朗普的推销失败
item.description: 即使在小唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump Jr.）盛赞这家在线枪支零售商之后，GrabAGun Digital Holdings Inc. 的股价自上市以来仍一路下滑。【原文：Shares of GrabAGun Digital Holdings Inc. have slumped since their public debut even after Donald Trump Jr. extolled the online firearms retailer.】

item.title: 戴尔运营总裁接管个人电脑部门应对需求低迷
item.description: 在个人电脑业务长期低迷的情况下，戴尔科技公司对部分领导层进行了重组，让首席运营官杰夫-克拉克（Jeff Clarke）直接负责个人电脑部门。【原文：Dell Technologies Inc. has reorganized some of its leadership, putting Chief Operating Officer Jeff Clarke directly in charge of its personal computer unit amid a prolonged slump in that business.】

item.title: ASM 第二季度订单因高级逻辑预订而减少
item.description: ASM International NV 第二季度订单不及预期，原因是其先进逻辑/铸造业务部门的预订量减少。【原文：ASM International NV’s second-quarter orders missed expectations due to lower bookings from its advanced logic/foundry business segment.】

item.title: 诺基亚以美元疲软和关税为由下调盈利预测
item.description: 诺基亚公司（Nokia Oyj）表示，以美元疲软和关税为由，下调了今年的利润指导。【原文：Nokia Oyj said it cut its profit guidance for the year, citing a weaker US dollar and tariffs.】

item.title: 波多黎各委员会对 Fortress 液化天然气新交易深表关切
item.description: 波多黎各联邦监察机构重申对一份合同的深切关注，该合同将使新堡垒能源公司在十多年的时间里几乎完全控制该岛的液化天然气输送，并表示它对该交易是如何达成的存在严重疑问。【原文：Puerto Rico’s federal watchdog reiterated deep concerns about a contract that would give New Fortress Energy almost complete control of the island’s liquefied natural gas deliveries for more than a decade, and said it has serious questions about how the deal was hammered out.】

item.title: 满载铜的船只在特朗普征收 50%关税前争先恐后抵达美国
item.description: 至少有四艘运铜船正试图在八月前抵达美国港口，以抢在计划对金属征收进口关税之前抵达。【原文：At least four ships carrying copper are trying to reach US ports before August to get ahead of planned import tariffs on the metal.】

item.title: 意大利将对裕信银行竞购 BPM 重新施加大部分条件
item.description: 意大利正在制定一项新法令，准备对意大利联合信贷银行（UniCredit SpA）计划对 Banco BPM SpA 的收购重新施加大部分条件，这凸显了罗马对收购的持续抵制。【原文：Italy is working on a new decree which is set to reimpose most of its conditions for UniCredit SpA’s planned takeover of Banco BPM SpA, underscoring Rome’s continued resistance to the bid.】

item.title: 三分之一的尼日利亚银行在截止日期前达到资本要求
item.description: 尼日利亚中央银行表示，在 3 月份的最后期限到来之前，大约三分之一的贷款机构已经达到了新的资本要求门槛。【原文：Nigeria’s central bank said about a third of lenders have met its new capital requirements threshold ahead of a March deadline.】

item.title: 国际货币基金组织将在 200 亿美元项目首次审查期间讨论阿根廷问题
item.description: 据一位熟悉内情的人士透露，国际货币基金组织打算在周二举行的一次由其工作人员和执行董事会参加的非正式会议上讨论对阿根廷 200 亿美元计划的首次审查。【原文：The International Monetary Fund intends to discuss the first review of Argentina’s $20 billion program during an informal meeting between its staff and executive board on Tuesday, according to a person familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 英国削减援助预算后将世界银行资金削减 10
item.description: 英国将把对世界银行分支机构的 19.8 亿英镑（27 亿美元）承诺削减 10%，并减少对一些国家的援助，以帮助支付增加军费开支的费用。【原文：The UK is cutting its £1.98 billion ($2.7 billion) pledge to an arm of the World Bank by 10% and reducing aid to some countries to help cover the cost of increased military spending.】

item.title: 优步真的打开了盈利开关
item.description: 大家好，欢迎收看《奇货可居》时事通讯，这里每天都有来自《奇货可居》的精彩内容。有时是我们乔-韦森塔尔（Joe Weisenthal）和特蕾西-阿洛维（Tracy Alloway）为您带来我们对市场、金融和经济最新发展的看法。有时是我们的专家嘉宾和消息来源网络提供的内容。不管是什么，我们保证永远有趣。【原文：Hello and welcome to the newsletter, a grab bag of daily content from the Odd Lots universe. Sometimes it's us, Joe Weisenthal and Tracy Alloway, bringing you our thoughts on the most recent developments in markets, finance and the economy. And sometimes it's contributions from our network of expert guests and sources. Whatever it is, we promise it will always be interesting.】

item.title: Caisse 和魁北克政府投资加拿大海洋集团
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，海洋拖船公司 Groupe Ocean Inc. 计划在获得新资本和重组股东基础后，向新市场扩张，交易价值约为 6 亿加元（约合 4.4 亿美元）。【原文：Marine towing company Groupe Ocean Inc. plans to expand to new markets after securing new capital and restructuring its shareholder base in transactions that value the business at around C$600 million ($440 million), according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 萨默斯称贝森特质疑美联储 "越权 "是正确的
item.description: 劳伦斯-萨默斯支持财政部长斯科特-贝森特（Scott Bessent）对美联储非货币政策活动的质疑，他说，有些领域与更广泛的中央银行独立性问题不同。【原文：Lawrence Summers backed Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent’s questioning of the Federal Reserve’s non-monetary policy activities, saying that there were some areas that are distinct from the broader issue of central bank independence.】

item.title: Cathie Wood's Ark 押注汤姆-李的以太币宝库公司 BitMine
item.description: 凯茜-伍德（Cathie Wood）抢购了汤姆-李（Tom Lee）的比特矿沉浸技术公司（BitMine Immersion Technologies Inc.【原文：Cathie Wood snapped up shares of Tom Lee’s BitMine Immersion Technologies Inc., a US-listed Bitcoin miner that recently pivoted to pursue a treasury strategy tied to Ether, the world’s second-largest cryptocurrency.】

item.title: 油田需求疲软，哈里伯顿将淘汰部分设备
item.description: 哈里伯顿公司正在闲置一些油田设备，以应对页岩公司需求的恶化。【原文：Halliburton Co. is idling some oilfield equipment in response to deteriorating demand among shale companies.】

item.title: 瑞典绿色钢铁制造商因成本增加而亏损扩大
item.description: Stegra AB 公司目前正在瑞典北部建造世界上最大的绿色钢厂，该公司表示，由于临近投产，去年的经营亏损有所增加。【原文：Stegra AB, which is currently constructing the world’s largest green steel plant in northern Sweden, said its operating loss grew last year as it nears the start of production.】

item.title: 纳米比亚推出大胆改革，重获中上收入地位
item.description: 纳米比亚公布了一项雄心勃勃的发展计划，目标是在未来五年内实现平均 7% 的经济增长，力争在本十年末恢复中上收入水平。【原文：Namibia unveiled an ambitious development plan targeting average economic growth of 7% over the next five years, as it seeks to restore its upper-middle-income status by the end of the decade.】

item.title: 凯雷聘用高盛高管池加强信贷业务
item.description: Carlyle Group Inc. 聘请了高盛集团（Goldman Sachs Group Inc.【原文：Carlyle Group Inc. hired a Goldman Sachs Group Inc. executive to lead its direct lending arm as the money manager works to grow its private credit business.】

item.title: 由 Advent 支持的 NIQ 预计将把首次公开募股定价定在区间中点附近
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，NIQ Global Intelligence Plc 在美国的首次公开募股预计定价将在市场范围的中点左右。【原文：NIQ Global Intelligence Plc’s US initial public offering is expected to price around the midpoint of the marketing range, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 尽管房市疲软，D.R. Horton 盈利仍大幅增长
item.description: D.R. Horton 的股价创下五年多来的最大涨幅，原因是这家住宅建筑商公布的盈利超出预期，尽管美国房地产市场依然低迷。【原文：Shares of D.R. Horton rose the most in more than five years as the homebuilder posted earnings that beat expectations even as the US housing market remains sluggish.】

item.title: 安大略省省长称若贸易谈判失败可能征收电力出口税
item.description: 安大略省省长道格-福特（Doug Ford）表示，如果加拿大与特朗普政府之间的贸易谈判不能达成公平协议，他不排除重新对出口到美国各州的电力征收附加费的可能性。【原文：Ontario Premier Doug Ford said he hasn’t ruled out the idea of reimposing a surcharge on electricity exports to US states if trade talks between Canada and the Trump administration don’t result in a fair deal.】

item.title: 微软称中国黑客利用 SharePoint 漏洞
item.description: 微软公司指控中国国家支持的黑客利用其 SharePoint 文档管理软件中的漏洞，对全球企业和政府机构进行黑客攻击。【原文：Microsoft Corp. accused Chinese state-sponsored hackers of using flaws in its SharePoint document management software in a hacking campaign that has targeted businesses and government agencies around the world.】

item.title: 墨西哥要求通过债务协议支持墨西哥国家石油公司（Pemex），该公司债券大涨
item.description: 在墨西哥政府强制要求出售债务，为这家遭受重创的国有石油公司提供资金支持后，墨西哥石油公司发行的债券大涨。【原文：Bonds issued by Petroleos Mexicanos surged after the Mexican government mandated a debt sale meant to shore up resources for the battered state-owned oil company.】

item.title: 加密软件公司 Consensys 裁员约 7
item.description: 由以太坊区块链网络联合创始人之一经营的软件供应商 Consensys 计划裁员 49 人，约占其员工总数的 7%。【原文：Consensys, a software provider run by one of the co-founders of the Ethereum blockchain network, is planning to lay off 49 people, or about 7% of its workforce.】

item.title: 美国股市下跌，创纪录涨势在财报中失去动力
item.description: 美国股市周二下跌，由于投资者关注企业盈利，推动股指创下新纪录的涨势失去了动力。【原文：US equities fell on Tuesday, with a rally that has powered indexes to fresh records losing steam as investors pored over corporate earnings.】

item.title: 科尔百货公司股价暴涨，成为最新的 "备忘录 "公司
item.description: 周二，科尔公司（Kohl's Corp. ）的股价上涨了一倍多，在社交媒体上被零售商们大量提及，使其成为最新的流行股票。【原文：Kohl’s Corp. shares more than doubled Tuesday, minting it as the newest meme stock, amid an influx of mentions by retail traders on social media.】

item.title: Walleye 与多家对冲基金一起拒绝新现金
item.description: Walleye Capital 暂停接受新的现金，加入了一连串拒绝投资者的多行政对冲基金的行列，以避免因规模而陷入困境。【原文：Walleye Capital is pausing taking new cash, joining a string of multistrategy hedge funds turning down investors to avoid being bogged down by size.】

item.title: 法国因供需错配而加倍削减可再生能源
item.description: 2025 年上半年，法国削减的可再生能源发电量几乎是去年同期的两倍，因为大量的正午清洁能源与低迷的需求发生了冲突。【原文：France curtailed almost twice as much renewable electricity in the first half of 2025, compared with a year earlier, as a flood of midday clean energy collided with muted demand.】

item.title: 西班牙 Nostrum 公司寻求出售其数据中心项目的股份
item.description: 西班牙 Nostrum 集团旨在通过出售数据中心股权筹集多达 4 亿欧元（约合 4.68 亿美元）的资金，以满足人工智能激增的需求。【原文：Spain’s Nostrum Group aims to raise as much as €400 million ($468 million) by selling stakes in data centers as it seeks to tap surging demand for artificial intelligence.】

item.title: 通用电气启动两部分高等级债券销售
item.description: 通用电气公司周二启动了以美元计价的投资级债券销售。【原文：General Electric Co. has kicked off a dollar-denominated, investment-grade bond sale on Tuesday.】
